section.name: Introduction
section.p:
A firefox extension to help users with common tasks encountered surfing a web archive. This extension depends on the open source wayback machine. Among the features of the WAX Toolbar is a search field for querying the wayback machine OR for searching a full-text NutchWAX index (if one is available). You can also use the toolbar to switch between proxy-mode and the regular Internet; when in proxy-mode you can easily go back and forth in time.
To obtain the firefox extension, see downloads. Download the WaxToolbar.xpi binary. For further hints on how to configure and use the toolbar, see the Getting started.
